member.name: T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication
member.summary: Contract for a class to establish logic connection to a pinpad, send and receive commands to and from the pinpad.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.Connection
member.summary: Pinpad connection at the link level.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.ConnectionName
member.summary: Port name in which the pinpad is connected.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.SetTimeout(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets time interval for sending and receiving messages.
member.param: Time interval to wait for a message to be sent.Time in milliseconds and must be greater than 2 seconds to be changed
Time interval to wait for a message to be received.Time in milliseconds and must be greater than 2 seconds to be changed

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.OpenPinpadConnection
member.summary: Open logic connection to the pinpad.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.ClosePinpadConnection(System.String)
member.summary: Close logic connection, if it is connected.
member.param: Message to display after closing connection.
member.returns: Whether the connection was closed or not.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.Ping
member.summary: Checks if the connection with the Pinpad is alive. If the pinpad is disconnected, tries to connect again.
member.returns: True if the connection is alive.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.CancelRequest
member.summary: Was the request accepted by the Pinpad? Cancels the current request at the Pinpad. Should be called only once after the request was sent.
member.returns: True if accepted, false to resend.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.SendRequestAndReceiveResponse``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Sends a request and receives the specified generic type T.
member.typeparam: The corresponding response to the request sent.
member.returns: The response or null in case of failure.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.SendRequestAndVerifyResponseCode(System.Object)
member.summary: Sends a request, receives the response then verifies if the command name is not ERR and response code corresponds to success.
member.returns: True if the request was sent, response was received, command is not ERR and response code corresponds to success.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadCommunication.VerifyInsertCard
member.summary: Check if a card has been inserted into the pinpad
member.returns: Returns true when it detects an inserted card

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadKeyboard.DataPicker
member.summary: It contains methods to select data through the pinpad.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadKeyboard.GetKey
member.summary: Gets the next Key pressed at the Pinpad with the default, safe, method. Does not retrieve numeric keys.
member.returns: PinpadKey or Undefined on failure.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadKeyboard.GetNumericInput(Pinpad.Sdk.Model.FirstLineLabelCode,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.SecondLineLabelCode,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a numeric input from pinpad keyboard.
member.returns: Input from the keyboard. Null if nothing was received, whether of timeout or cancellation.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadKeyboard.GetAmount(Pinpad.Sdk.Model.AmountCurrencyCode)
member.summary: Gets a decimal amount. The amount shall be typed in the followed format: - "1,99" - "0,00" Containing always at least 4 chars.
member.param: Amount currency, i. e. R$, US$.
member.returns: The amount if a valid amount was typed. Null if: timeout, user cancelled, amount was typed on an invalid format (example: 1.7,2).

member.name: T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry
member.summary: Represents a physical card used to perform a transaction.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.Type
member.summary: Card type, defining the reading method (by EMV chip or magnetic stripe) to be used by the application.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.BrandId
member.summary: Card brand (for example Visa, MasterCard, Amex, etc).

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.PrimaryAccountNumberSequenceNumber
member.summary: Application PAN Sequencial number for joint bank account.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.ExpirationDate
member.summary: Card expiration date, printed in the original physical card.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.CardholderName
member.summary: Cardholder/card owner name, printed in the original physical card.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.Track1
member.summary: First track of card, if exists.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.Track2
member.summary: Second track of card, if exists.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.Track3
member.summary: Third track of card, if exists.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardEntry.NeedsPassword
member.summary: Defines whether the card needs password or not.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.Pin.KeySerialNumber
member.summary: Serial number of DUKPT key used on PIN encryption.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.Pin.EmvData
member.summary: EMV data, if exists. It's a group of information returned by EMV Kernel, representing several information about the transaction and the terminal itself.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.Pin.IsOnline
member.summary: Defines if password authentication is online or offline (using pinpad security internal methods).

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.Pin.CardholderNameExtended
member.summary: Indicates the whole cardholder name when greater than 26 characters using the same coding convention as in ISO 7813.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadInfos.Specifications
member.summary: Specification version at format "V.VV" or "VVVA" where A is the alphanumeric identifier, example: "108a"

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadInfos.OperatingSystemVersion
member.summary: Basic software or Operational System versions, without a defined format

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadInfos.IsStoneSupported
member.summary: If stone is supported on this pinpad. If this value is false, none financial operation can be performed.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadInfos.IsStoneProprietaryDevice
member.summary: Defines if the application running in the pinpad is made by Stone.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadInfos.GetDukptSerialNumber(System.Int32,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TypeCode.CryptographyMode)
member.summary: Obtains the current KSN (Key Serial Number) of an index in the table.
member.returns: The obtained KSN, or null if the KSN was not found.

member.name: T:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadDisplay
member.summary: Responsible for presenting messages in a pinpad device.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadDisplay.ShowMessage(System.String,System.String,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.DisplayPaddingType)
member.param: The first line of the message, shown at the first screen line. Must have 16 characters or less.
The second line of the message, shown at the second screen line. Must have 16 characters or less.
At what alignment the message is present. It default value is left alignment.
member.returns: Whether the message could be shown with success or not.
member.exception: This exception is thrown only if one (or both) of the messages exceed the limit of 16 characters.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadDisplay.ShowMessageWithTimer(System.String,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.DisplayPaddingType)
member.summary: Show message on pinpad screen and wait 3 seconds.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadDisplay.ShowSelectionMenu(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Show selection menu on pinpad screen.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadTransaction.RemoveCard(System.String,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.DisplayPaddingType)
member.summary: On Pinpad screen, alternates between "RETIRE O CARTÃO" and parameter 'message' received, until card removal.
member.param: Message to be shown on pinpad screen. Must not exceed 16 characters. This message remains on Pinpad screen after card removal.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadTransaction.ReadCard(Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TransactionType,System.Decimal,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.TransactionType@,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Pinpad.Sdk.Model.PinpadCardBrand},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Read basic card information, that is, brand id, card type, card primary account number (PAN), cardholder name and expiration date. If the card is removed in the middle of the process, returns CANCEL status.
member.param: If this method is called without knowing transaction type, pinpad will prompt for this information and return the value choosed by the cardholder.
True if the method should map all properties from the card; false if the method should map only the card's tracks.
member.returns: Card basic info.
member.exception: When an expired card is read.

member.name: M:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.IPinpadTransaction.ReadPassword(System.Decimal,System.String,Pinpad.Sdk.Model.CardType,System.String)
member.summary: If cardholder card needs password, than prompts it. Otherwise, nothing is done.
member.param: Card type, defining how the card must be read.
member.returns: An object Pin, containing pin block (cardholder password), Key Serial Number (KSN, determining pin block DUKPT encryption key) and if pin verification is online.

member.summary: Terminal Verification Results: Status of the different functions as seen from the terminal.

member.summary: Transaction Date: Local date that the transaction was authorised formatted as YYMMDD.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.EmvTagCode.TransactionType
member.summary: Transaction Type: Indicates the type of financial transaction, represented by the first two digits of ISO 8583:1987 Processing Code.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.EmvTagCode.AmountAuthorized
member.summary: Authorised (Numeric), Authorised amount of the transaction (excluding adjustments).

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.EmvTagCode.IssuerApplicationData
member.summary: Issuer Application Data: Contains proprietary application data for transmission to the issuer in an online transaction.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.EmvTagCode.UnpredictableNumber
member.summary: Unpredictable Number: Value to provide variability and uniqueness to the generation of a cryptogram.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.EmvTagCode.CryptogramInformationData
member.summary: Cryptogram Information Data: Indicates the type of cryptogram and the actions to be performed by the terminal.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.EmvTagCode.CardholderVerificationMethodResults
member.summary: Cardholder Verification Method (CVM) Results: Indicates the results of the last CVM performed.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.NotSecureCommunication
member.summary: Attempt to use safe communication while it was not established

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.InvalidCommand
member.summary: Invalid call to function, previous operations are required, or unknown command

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.OperationCancelled
member.summary: Operation was cancelled by the operator Cancel key was pressed

member.summary: PinPad was not open, OPN was not previously called

member.summary: A mandatory parameter was not sent

member.summary: EMV tables versions different than expected

member.summary: Error writing tables, lack of space for example

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.InternalError
member.summary: Internal error, unexpected situation without a specific return code

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.PinIndexNotFound
member.summary: Online pin key index is not present

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.NoneCardDetected
member.summary: No card inserted or CTLS detected

member.summary: Could not capture PIN temporarily for security reasons, for example: reached capture limit within a time inverval.

member.summary: Secure Access Module (SAM) missing, mute or with communication error.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.InconsistentCard
member.summary: Card contains invalid or inconsistent data

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.InvalidEmvApplication

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.UnableToProcessEmvApplication
member.summary: Selected EMV application may not be used in this situation

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.Fallback
member.summary: High level EMC error passive of fallback to magnetic stripe

member.name: F:Pinpad.Sdk.Model.ResponseStatus.UnableToProcessCtlsApplication
